en.hero-desc: Fullstack developer focused on creating modern, accessible, and functional digital experiences.
en.about-text:
I'm a Fullstack Developer currently in the 6th semester of my Information Systems degree at PUC Minas. Alongside my academic journey, I'm taking part in specialized training in Full Stack Web Development, where I'm sharpening my skills in both front-end and back-end technologies.

On the front end, I work with WordPress, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. On the back end, I develop using Node.js, MongoDB, and Python. I also use modern development tools such as Git, GitHub, and VSCode, and I'm exploring emerging technologies including AI automation, machine learning, and neural networks.

I'm passionate about turning ideas into clean, efficient, and scalable digital solutions. I value attention to detail, clear communication, and always aim to deliver meaningful results.
en.service-1: Modern and fast websites that work perfectly on any device
en.service-2: Custom systems and dashboards tailored to your business
en.service-3: Secure database integration to manage your information
en.service-4: Accessible websites that are easy for everyone to use
en.project-1: Network Infrastructure â€“ Network Infrastructure Management System: A project focused on managing a company's network infrastructure, including mapping departments, connected devices, and controlling IT resources across headquarters and branch offices.
en.project-2: Bibliotech â€“ Library Book Rental Management: A system designed for managing the rental and return of books in libraries. It enables efficient control of borrowings, reservations, and user history.
en.project-3: Neurolink â€“ Mental Health Clinic Appointment App: An application developed to schedule appointments at a mental health clinic. It allows patients to choose professionals, book time slots, and track their consultation history.
en.project-4: Business Intelligence â€“ Humanitarian NGO â€“ A data analysis (BI) system for a non-governmental organization, focused on identifying poverty areas, tracking donations, and managing items needed for humanitarian campaigns.
en.project-5: CresÃ§a â€“ Child Development Monitoring Platform: A platform for tracking child development up to 6 years old. It collects and analyzes cognitive, motor, and social data, supporting educators and guardians in monitoring children's progress.
en.project-6: PetShop Management System â€“ This project is a distributed system designed for managing clients, services, and grooming appointments (bathing and trimming) in pet shops. The system is intended exclusively for internal use by the staff, providing a practical and accessible solution directly via smartphone or tablet.
en.contact-text: You can reach me through the links below or email me at rivlisfer@gmail.com.
en.footer: Â© 2025 All rights reserved | Designed and developed by Fernanda Belmont
